channel.title: Blog on Slices of a hacker's mind
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Slices of a hacker's mind

item.title: Phone
item.description: This is my first post composed on my phone. It took some time to get here, but it’s finally done!

item.title: Thinking Ahead
item.description: I did not manage to publish a post the recent days, and I’m wondering why.

item.title: Cold
item.description: Hey everyone, unfortunate I turn sick. Last week some relative turn sick and some day later the next one.

item.title: About Technology
item.description: Many years ago, I moved to my first flat for my schooling.

item.title: Clean Up
item.description: In the last days I had to go through my older posts.

item.title: Hugo Youtube Shortcode
item.description: For my series on kernel exploitation[0] I need to embed a YouTube video.

item.title: Blogfixes
item.description: Today was a quite busy day with minor things. I’ve fixed the Hugo related things and updated the contact page to be reachable again.

item.title: Fix Mathjs in Hugo
item.description: With the change to shortcodes, Hugo seemed to have drop support for inline HTML code in markdown.

item.title: The defining narrative
item.description: In this post[0], I wanted to think about feedback. While I was writing on it, I notice how I was slowly drifting.

item.title: Set a new posts in Hugo to draft
item.description: I put all the posts by default draft mode. This is done by having an archtype[0] document.

item.title: a learning mindset
item.description: In the recent days, I’ve got some neat feedback about some posts and I must say that I love it.

item.title: Updated Tags
item.description: Today is going to be a short one: Instead of writing much, I’ve updated the tags and categories for the blog.

item.title: Decisions
item.description: What makes a decision a good one? What makes it a bad one?

item.title: Fear of Publishing
item.description: As a follow up of my yesterdays post I’ve created a new mail account for this very blog: blog@akendo.

item.title: Feedback Channels
item.description: Feedback is something we all seek for, but almost all are lacking, this blog is no exception.

item.title: 100DaysToOffload
item.description: Hey happy new year everyone! I’m wishing everyone the best for the year of 2021!

item.title: Writing ahead
item.description: A Happy new year everyone, this is a late one! I have a bit of an announcement to make: There will be more blog posts!

item.title: Side notes about Hugo
item.description: Some additional notes about Hugo: I’ve changed the pagination of the main page.

item.title: Search with hugo
item.description: I’ve added a search function to the blog. I’ve been more often here and did some search of posts of my own.

item.title: Archtypes in Hugo
item.description: I’m using hugo for some time now. However, one aspect of hugo was always a problem for me: Creating new posts with hugo new.

item.title: Notes about Hugo
item.description: Hugo allows you to get very easy a new theme. Sometimes this new theme have some option you don’t want.

item.title: to hugo
item.description: My trouble on the way to a new blogging software: I wanted to blog more, but an update of some ruby broke my blog….
